doc.title: Halloween Treat
doc.plot: Celebrate a magical, high-spirited Halloween, with this collection of classic scenes, from Walt Disney's greatest animated feature films and cartoon shorts! Snow White and the seven dwarfs encounter the wicked Queen, in a breathtaking sequence from this Disney triumpth of art and imagination. Then, from the legendary 'Fantasia,' there's a ghostly gathering of hobgoblins, stepping out, for a "Night on Bald Mountain." The fun continues, with hauntingly familiar scenes from 'Peter Pan,' 'Lady and the Tramp,' 'One Hundred and One Dalmations,' and more - all brought together in this supernatural animated Disney treat!
